body.name: OUKITEL WP30 Pro 5G Rugged Smartphone Unlocked - 24GB+512GB 6.78" FHD+ Octa-Core Rugged Phones Android 13, 108MP+32MP Front Camera, 11000mAh Battery 120W Fast Charge Cell Phone, IP68 Waterproof, NFC
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 54 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 1 hr 39 mins
features: [MediaTek Dimensity 8050 & 24GB+512GB] 3.0 GHz high-frequency 5G rugged smartphone powered by the Dimensity 8050 octa-core processor. With UFS 3.1 technology boasting lightning-fast read and write speeds of up to 1200MB/s, and a highly efficient 6nm manufacturing process to avoid delays, crashes, or overheating. Equipped with a massive 24GB of RAM (12GB physical + 12GB virtual RAM) and a capacious 512GB of storage, allowing multiple memory-hungry apps to run simultaneously and providing ample storage space

[6.78” Main Screen + OLED Secondary Screen] The rugged phone features a 6.78-inch main screen with a 120Hz refresh rate, ensuring a smooth experience whether you're browsing content, watching movies, or playing games. On the back of the phone, there is a 1.75 in secondary screen that serves as a clock with over 20 UI interfaces to choose from. It also offers additional functionality such as a compass, camera, music control, message notifications, and battery status, enhancing usability

[108MP Primary Camera + 32MP Front Camera + 20MP Night Vision Camera] The 2023 outdoor waterproof smartphone features a brand new 108MP primary camera, delivering satisfying levels of detail and vibrant imagery. The 20MP night vision camera unveils hidden treasures in every shot, even in near darkness. The 32MP front camera captures ultra-high-resolution photos, even in challenging lighting conditions. Additionally, a 5MP macro camera provides a clearer perspective

[120W Extremely Fast Charging & 11000mAh Battery] OUKITEL WP30 Pro rugged mobile phone supports 120W extremely fast charging. It can charge 50% of the power in 15 minutes and fully charge in 45 minutes. It can easily solve the problem of running out of power outdoors. Equipped with a large 11000mAh battery, you can enjoy up to 1400 Hours of standby time ensure that your device is always available, supporting 60 hours of calls, 10 hours of music, and 13.50 hours of video

[Corning Gorilla Glass 5 & 360° Comprehensive Protection] This military grade cell phone is equipped with tough Corning Gorilla Glass 5, providing protection against drops and impacts during daily use. It has passed IP68, IP69K, and MIL-STD-810H tests, ensuring excellent water, dust, sand, moisture, dirt, and salt spray resistance. It can survive drops from 1.5 meters and is waterproof up to 1.5 meters for 30 minutes, providing reliable protection even in the harshest outdoor conditions

[Dual SIM Unlocked Phone & 5G Connectivity] The OUKITEL WP30 Pro rugged phone supports dual SIM cards and is compatible with T-Mobile. It does not work with AT&T, Cricket, Verizon, Sprint, or US Cellular, so please confirm your SIM card's compatibility with your carrier before purchasing. This phone provides access to 5G networks and runs the latest Android 13 operating system for smooth performance. We offer a 1-year warranty, so feel free to contact us with any questions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money!
reviews.reviewText: The package arrived on time. I was a little worried before I opened it, but then I was surprised by what was in the package. The overall color tone and the texture in my hand were great. Android tablet uses the MediaTek Helio G99 processor, which makes the graphics complex. The game also runs smoothly, which is also an important reason why I bought it. Everything is fine so far.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUEN EQUIPO POR UN BUEN PRECIO

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm surprised by how good the quality is. Best rugged phone for outdoor. Meanwhile, it's fast, large memory, the fingerprint reads instantly. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The OUKITEL WP30 Pro 5G Rugged Smartphone is absolutely amazing! With its powerful MediaTek Dimensity 8050 processor and a whopping 24GB of RAM, I was able to multitask effortlessly and smoothly.512GB of storage was more than enough to store all of my apps, games, and files.The 6.78-inch main screen refreshes at a whopping 120Hz, delivering an immersive viewing experience.The OLED sub-screen was a great addition, offering convenient features such as clock and camera.108MP main camera takes stunning photos, while the 32MP front-facing camera is a great addition, offering convenient features such as clock and camera. The OLED secondary screen is a great addition, offering handy features like a clock and camera.108-megapixel main camera takes stunning photos, while the 32-megapixel front-facing camera takes crisp selfies.The 20-megapixel night vision camera is a game changer, letting me take impressive photos even in low-light conditions.120W fast charging is a lifesaver, with an 11,000mAh battery that lets me take photos in low light. The 11,000mAh battery lasted me all day. All in all, I'm impressed with this rugged smartphone!

reviews.reviewTitle: Bonne autonomie,belle qualité photo et très fluide
🔝🆗🔝 Un top smartphone, bello, resistente e potente 🔝🆗🔝
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Esteticamente mi piace molto, la scocca sul retro in carbonio e il piccolo display a colori lo rende davvero fantastico e fuori dal comune, realizzato con materiali super resistenti, bello spesso e pesantuccio, in tasca si fa sentire molto. Per quanto riguarda il funzionamento nulla da dire, è veloce e perfetto per qualsiasi utilizzo, le pagine e le app si aprono celermente, anche sotto stress il processore non si surriscalda, perfetto anche per il gaming. La batteria ha una durata infinita, la ricarica super veloce da 120w lo ricarica al 100% in circa 120 minuti ed in 30 minuti al 50%. Il display si vede bene, la luminosità non è elevatissima ma i colori sono vivaci e brillanti, il display sul retro è comodissimo, sembra un piccolo smartwatch, è touch ed offre molte funzioni, si possono scattare foto e video, una cosa molto interessante che visualizza le notifiche. La fotocamera scatta delle foto decidenti, tutto sommato per un rugged va più che bene.

Ich liebäugel schon länger mit Outdoorsmartphones und da die großen Hersteller so etwas nicht herstellen, habe ich mich nach langer Recherche und Bewertungen lesen für dieses hier entschieden.Ein großer Speicher und ein großer Akku war mir wichtig, genau wie gute Outdoorfähigkeiten.Das Smartphone macht einen sehr stabilen und wertigen Eindruck, es ist auch sehr schwer. Aber das ist bei allen Outdoorgeräten so. Es liegt dadurch aber auch gut in der Hand und man läuft auch nicht die Gefahr dass es einem aus der Hand gleitet.Es ist gegen wasser und staub geschützt. Für das Abenteuer draußen hat es einen integrierten Kompass. Das Display ist mit Gorillaglas verstärkt, somit macht es auch nichts wenn das Handy aus nicht allzugroßer Höhe mal runterfällt.Mit dem 11000mAh großen Akku komme ich mehrere Tage ohne Aufladen klar, das ist richtig geil!Das System, Android 13, läuft sehr flüssig und macht keine Probleme.Besonders überzeugt haben mich die Kameras: Hauptkamera 108 MP und die vordere Kamera hat 32 MP.Die Kamera unterstützt Nachtsicht und macht durch einen Makromodus besonders gute Bilder von Objekten die nah am Handy sind.Das Smartphone ist mein Begleiter auf Wanderungen, beim Skifahren, Quadfahren und im Alltag und macht dabei durch die Outdoorfähigkeiten eine besonders gute Figur.Ich bin topzufrieden und würde das Gerät jedem weiterempfehlen :)

Il telefono è davvero ben fatto e le prestazioni sono buone, la batteria dura davvero molto e dopo varie cadute non ha nemmeno un graffio.Una pecca che non ha il 5G. Nonostante Nella barra delle notifiche ci sia la sigla 5G, il telefono usa la tecnologia 4G+. Ho acquistato il telefono perché necessito di un 5G robusto per lavoro, faccio installazioni FWA e purtroppo mi vedo costretto ad utilizzare ancora il mio vecchio Samsung S20Fe perché con questo non posso verificare la copertura mobile.

The media could not be loaded. Mein altes Oukitel was gute Dienste geleistet hat, benötigte jetzt trotzdem einen Nachfolger und ja, es ist wieder ein Oukitel geworden.Das Oukitel WP 30 Pro hat mich von Anfang an beeindruckt.Mit einem leistungsstarken Prozessor bietet es eine flüssige Performance, die in Kombination mit der IP69-Zertifizierung für herausragende Robustheit sorgt, was für mich sehr wichtig ist.Die Verarbeitung ist erstklassig, und das Smartphone ist wirklich für den Outdoor-Einsatz konzipiert.Mit großzügigem internen Speicher und ausreichend Arbeitsspeicher ist das Oukitel WP 30 Pro ein echtes Kraftpaket, genau das habe ich auch gesucht.Die Integration von Android 13 ermöglicht ein modernes und reibungsloses Benutzererlebnis.Die Akkulaufzeit ist beeindruckend, und das 120-Watt-Schnellladen macht das Aufladen im Handumdrehen erledigt.Besonders hervorzuheben sind die Hauptkamera und die Nachtsichtkamera, die gestochen scharfe Bilder in verschiedenen Lichtverhältnissen ermöglichen.Das Oukitel WP 30 Pro erfüllt nicht nur die Anforderungen eines Outdoor-Smartphones, sondern setzt auch in Bezug auf Leistung und Funktionalität Maßstäbe.Ein absolutes Highlight für alle, die ein zuverlässiges und leistungsstarkes Smartphone für den Outdoor-Bereich suchen.Gewicht und Größe sind natürlich Backstein;)
